original: @39a * // 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i nyes dmigs bshad pa //
analyzed: @39a * // 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i nyes dmigs bshad pa //
translated: The faults of the five sense pleasures

original: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to youthful Manjushri.

original: ri dags glang po @39b phye ma leb dang nya //
analyzed: ri dags glang po @39b phye ma leb dang nya //
translated: Deer, elephants, butterflies, fish,

original: sbrang ma lnga po de yang lnga yis bcom 'gyur te /
analyzed: sbrang ma lnga po de yang lnga yis bcom 'gyur te /
translated: and bees are destroyed by the five.

original: gcig gis bcom na gang zhig lnga rnams ni //
analyzed: gcig gis bcom na gang zhig lnga rnams ni //
translated: If one of them destroys the five,

original: rtag tu bstan pa ci phyir bcom mi 'gyur //
analyzed: rtag tu bstan pa ci phyir bcom mi 'gyur //
translated: why are the five not always destroyed?

original: rtsva yi myu gu gtsang ma za //
analyzed: rtsva yi myu gu gtsang ma za //
translated: Eating pure grass shoots,

original: shin tu ring du 'gro nus pa //
analyzed: shin tu ring du 'gro nus pa //
translated: able to go very far,

original: ri dags rdon pa'i glu dbyangs kyis //
analyzed: ri dags rdon pa'i glu dbyangs kyis //
translated: the deer hunter's song

original: nges par gsod pa tshol par 'gyur ;
analyzed: nges par gsod pa tshol par 'gyur ;
translated: will surely seek to kill.

original: / sa srung dang ni rab 'gren cing //
analyzed: / sa srung dang ni rab 'gren cing //
translated: Protecting the earth and spreading out,

original: ri yi rgyal po rgyun shes bya'i //
analyzed: ri yi rgyal po rgyun shes bya'i //
translated: the king of mountains is known as the constant

original: ban glang mo yi nye reg gis //
analyzed: ban glang mo yi nye reg gis //
translated: touching of the female elephant,

original: nges par glang po bsad sar song //
analyzed: nges par glang po bsad sar song //
translated: will surely go to where the elephant is killed.ðŸ”½Seeing the great fire

original: 'bar ba chen po'i tshogs dag gi / me chen dag ni mthong nas kyang //
analyzed: 'bar ba chen po'i tshogs dag gi / me chen dag ni mthong nas kyang //
translated: of the great mass of blazing fire,

original: gzugs la chags pa chen po yang //
analyzed: gzugs la chags pa chen po yang //
translated: the great attachment to form

original: phye leb me la 'jug par 'gyur ;
analyzed: phye leb me la 'jug par 'gyur ;
translated: will surely enter the fire like a moth.

original: / bkag pa med pa'i lam 'gro zhing //
analyzed: / bkag pa med pa'i lam 'gro zhing //
translated: One who travels the path without obstruction

original: rtag tu rnam par rgyu ba yin //ðŸ”½ro myang ba la chags pa yi //
analyzed: rtag tu rnam par rgyu ba yin // ro myang ba la chags pa yi //
translated: is always free.ðŸ”½The fish who is attached to savoring

original: nya ni lcags kyus rlag par byed //
analyzed: nya ni lcags kyus rlag par byed //
translated: is destroyed by the hook.

original: rtag tu nam mkha' la rgyu zhing //
analyzed: rtag tu nam mkha' la rgyu zhing //
translated: Always moving through the sky,

original: gzugs ni shin tu yid 'ong ba'i //ðŸ”½bum pa dri yis nyes pa yis //
analyzed: gzugs ni shin tu yid 'ong ba'i // bum pa dri yis nyes pa yis //
translated: the form is very attractive.ðŸ”½The pot is definitely destroyed

original: des par 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin //ðŸ”½ri dags nyid ni sgra tsam gyis //
analyzed: des par 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin // ri dags nyid ni sgra tsam gyis //
translated: by the fault of the smell.ðŸ”½The deer is destroyed by sound alone,

original: reg pas glang po brlag par 'gyur //
analyzed: reg pas glang po brlag par 'gyur //
translated: the elephant by touch.

original: gzugs nyid kyis ni phye leb ste //
analyzed: gzugs nyid kyis ni phye leb ste //
translated: The moth is destroyed by form itself,

original: ro yis nya ni rnam par rlag / bud ba dri la chags pa ste //
analyzed: ro yis nya ni rnam par rlag / bud ba dri la chags pa ste //
translated: the fish by taste.

original: 'di dag rgyu ni re re yis //
analyzed: 'di dag rgyu ni re re yis //
translated: These are destroyed by each of these causes.

original: skyes bu dag ni gcig la yang //
analyzed: skyes bu dag ni gcig la yang //
translated: For a single person,

original: lnga po 'di dag rtag ldan zhing//
analyzed: lnga po 'di dag rtag ldan zhing//
translated: these five are always present.

original: nyin mtshan du ni rab 'joms na //
analyzed: nyin mtshan du ni rab 'joms na //
translated: If they destroy day and night,

original: bde ba gnas ji thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: bde ba gnas ji thob par 'gyur //
translated: how can one attain a state of happiness?

original: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i nyes dmigs bshad pa slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i nyes dmigs bshad pa slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: This concludes the explanation of the faults of the five sense pleasures composed by the master Vasubandhu.
